headline: Assessing Packaging Corporation of America After Multi Year Rally and DCF Upside in 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether Packaging Corporation of America is still worth buying after its strong multi year run, you are not alone. This article is going to focus squarely on what the current price really offers. The stock now trades around $202.82, down 1.1% over the last week but still up 4.4% over the past month and sitting on hefty 71.6% and 73.0% gains over 3 and 5 years, even though it is currently down 10.0% year to date and 8.8% over the last year.
